**Part 1 - Garmin**

*Heart Rate*
```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#summary(HRmd)
HRSUM <- HRmd%>%
summarySE(measurevar = "hr", groupvar =c("speed","BFR"), na.rm = TRUE, conf.interval = 0.95, .drop = TRUE)
HRSUM

histogram(HRmd$hr)

HRSUMplot <- HRmd%>%
summarySE(measurevar = "hr", groupvar =c("speed","BFR"), na.rm = TRUE, conf.interval = 0.95, .drop = TRUE)

#basic.lm <- lm(hr ~ km_h, data = HRmd)


HRplot <- ggplot(HRSUMplot,aes(x= speed, y= hr))+
          geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = hr-se, ymax=hr+se), width = 0.1)+
          geom_point(aes(colour = BFR))
          
          #geom_smooth(method = "lm")

HRplot

```

**Part 2 - PARVO**

*Minute Ventilation*
```{r, echo=FALSE}
#summary(PARVOmd)
VESUM <- PARVOmd%>%
  summarySE(measurevar = "VE", groupvar =c("speed","BFR"), na.rm = TRUE, conf.interval = 0.95, .drop = TRUE)
VESUM
histogram(PARVOmd$VE)
```

*Respiration Rate*
```{r, echo=FALSE}
RRSUM <- PARVOmd%>%
  summarySE(measurevar = "RR", groupvar =c("speed","BFR"), na.rm = TRUE, conf.interval = 0.95, .drop = TRUE)
RRSUM
histogram(PARVOmd$RR)
```

*Fraction of Carbon Dioxide*
```{r, echo=FALSE}
FECO2SUM <- PARVOmd%>%
  summarySE(measurevar = "FECO2", groupvar =c("speed","BFR"), na.rm = TRUE, conf.interval = 0.95, .drop = TRUE)
FECO2SUM
histogram(PARVOmd$FECO2)

```
